Package callofproject.dev.authentication.mapper

Interface IUserMapper

public interface IUserMapper
Mapper class for mapping User entities to UserDTOs.

  • Method Details

    • toUser

      callofproject.dev.repository.authentication.entity.User toUser(UserSignUpRequestDTO dto)
      Maps a UserSignUpRequestDTO to a User entity.
      Parameters:
      dto - The UserSignUpRequestDTO to be mapped.
      Returns:
      A User entity representing the mapped UserSignUpRequestDTO.

      Returns:
